name: Perfect Awareness
text: You can set aside all irrelevant sensory information to understand your surroundings perfectly for a moment.
prerequisites: Wis 17, Combat Meditation, Meditation Master, character level 9th.
benefit: Once per day, you can take 20 on a Perception check as a move action.
text_zh: 你可以在短时间内拒绝所有不相干的感觉信息来获得对你周围环境的完美感知。
prerequisites_zh: 感知17，战斗冥想，冥想大师，角色等级9。
benefit_zh: 每天1次，你可以用一个移动动作在一次察觉检定中取20。
